name: @txo-peer-dep/react-native-device-utils
description: Technology Studio - React native device utils

scripts.republish: npm unpublish $(cat package.json | jq -r '.name')@$(cat package.json | jq -r '.version') && yarn publish --new-version $(cat package.json | jq -r '.version')
scripts.build: yarn build:clean && yarn build:lib && yarn build:flow
